tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: My mother suffering with pain while walking due to AVN avascular necrosis of hip joint on both side.. and we all at home were tensed about her health conditions.. where to consult or what to be done, then I got to know about dr.Shashikiran from one of my friend..  thanks to doctor for expert opinion regarding disease and simple way of treatment. Now amma feeling positive strength and got hopes of recovery. I would like to recommend those who is suffering with any kind of bone related issues or arthritis diseases. They must consult once to Dr.Shashikiran. thank you

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: I would easily recommend my doctor to anyone infact I already have .. the nature of treatment, the explanation and so friendly , that you already feel so well.  A person with deepest pain also would feel relieved .. Being the anxious person , I was so frightened to even see blood forget a surgery on my hand .. If I  could overcome all this is only because of the doctor 's treatment and nothing else . The doctor never let me panic in any way . It all happened so smoothly . I cannot be more thankful than this.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: Hi, I had been to this clinic for pain and swelling at toe joint,  knee and fore hand joint since I had fell down from two Wheeler. Dr shashikiran sir was friendly and listened to me whatever I was explaining. He also asked, if I hv got hurt in any other locations.  He explained all the details in detail and he is kind and humble. Staffs were also friendly and have good helping nature. Clinic is neat and clean. X ray facility is available there itself. After taking appointment, follow up will be there through text message. Time management is very good. Overall it is very good clinic.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr Shashi Kiran was very welcoming and  thank him for taking time to time to diagonise the root cause and coming with treatment options. He was very clear in explanation. It's rare to find a doctor who can explain in layman's language.

The staff were really welcoming and the hygiene in the clinic is excellent.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: A preconsultation, xray, post consultation with xray, all was done so good. Highly recommended this doctor. I always view reviews and go to the doctor. He explained the issue to my moms shoulder problem and taught her exercises as well.Satisfied. Thanks dr sir & practo.  I felt the charges were very very reasonable.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Extremely hospitable doctor and the staff.  Since it was an emergency, although the clinic was shut, thanks to personal attention to patients, the entire clinic opened and all the staff came, took swift X-rays and treated me well. Overall the assurance and the delicate nature in which Dr. Shashikiran handled the injury is very commendable.

Doctor was friendly and diagnosing the problem very well. My ankle was twisted while playing cricket and for that went to this clinic. 

He did scan and given medication.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,
review: I have just started taking knee pain treatment with Dr Shashikiran. He has excellently explained the causes & treatment regarding my knee pain. He  very calmly listens to the patient‚Äôs problems and very friendly replies to us. Today is my 5th day of my treatment and I am feeling far better and Hope I will be surely alright after completing the treatment with exercises in a couple of months. I strongly recommend patient‚Äôs like me to consult Dr Shashikiran. My sincere thanks and wish him all success in his profession. With regards üôèüèΩüòä
